articles.content:
Preparatory committees formed abroad
    Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee to commemorate Sun's Day was inaugurated on Thursday with due ceremony on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.   The inaugural ceremony set April as the month of commemorating Sun's Day and decided to hold colorful events.   Meanwhile, a Mexican preparatory committee to commemorate Sun's Day was formed on Mar. 31.

139th Chondoism anniversary
articles.content:
139th Chondoism anniversary
     Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A "heaven day ceremony" was held on Monday at the Central Church of the Korean Chondoist Church on the 139th anniversary of Chondoism.   A report was delivered by chairwoman of the Korean Chondoist Church Central Guidance Committee Tojong Ryu Mi Yong at the ceremony.   She referred to the circumstances of the founding of Chondoism and the patriotic activities carried on by the Chondoists to realize the idea of "building up the nation and providing the welfare of the people" and "earthly paradise" after the foundation.   Pointing to the tasks to materialize the idea of Chondoism under the present-day situation, she called upon all Chondoists to make a fresh turn this year in the struggle for building a powerful nation and in the movement for national reunification.   On the same day, similar ceremonies were held at Chondoist temples in local areas.

Sun's Day and 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
Sun's Day and 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of NDC of DPRK
   Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Seminar, lecture meeting, photo exhibition, opening ceremony of a week of film show and other functions were held in Tanzania, Uganda and Guyana on the occasion of Sun's Day and the 6th anniversary of General Secretary  Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defense Commission.   At the functions the participants pointed out that today progressives of the world significantly commemorate the birthday of the President Kim Il Sung for his man-centred philosophy and immortal exploits for the era and humankind.   Today Korean style socialism invariably advances thanks to Kim Jong Il's leadership art of attaching priority to the army, they stressed.   And commemorative events were held in Madagascar, Democratic Congo and Egypt with the approach of Sun's Day.

articles.content:
DPRK parliamentary union delegation leaves 
   Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK parliamentary union led by deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly Choe Su Hon left here today by air to attend the 101st inter-parliamentary conference to be held in Belgium.
